title: 55: OBITCH get the plunger!
description:
Oh Geoffs, this week we’re getting nasty! From exploding toilets to some pretty unsexy deaths, this episode has everything. We’ve got an obituary with a twist, and another that goes round n’ round, and of course we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminallllllls! 


SEE US LIVE IN IRVINE ON AUGUST 4TH: https://tinyurl.com/3fvwbsnz



Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 


Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com


Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes

PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807


Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast



Sources:

https://www.kcci.com/article/polk-county-iowa-hidden-message-on-headstone-raises-concerns/40291945#

https://www.mentalfloss.com/posts/london-great-stink-river-thames-sewer

https://curiosity.lib.harvard.edu/contagion/feature/cholera-epidemics-in-the-19th-century

https://www.bbc.com/news/uk-25259505

https://thoughtcatalog.com/jeremy-london/2019/08/17-people-who-died-on-the-toilet/

https://www.findmypast.co.uk/blog/history/what-a-stink-that-time-london-smelled-so-bad-that-government-was-aband

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edmund_Ironside#Death

https://banonblogs.blogspot.com/2009/05/cessna-crashes-onto-portable-toilets.html

http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/americas/8030898.stm

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2237066/Why-Why-Why--The-eulogy-cheating-pastor-read-mistress-husband-shot-dead.html

https://toiletology.com/important-people-in-toilet-history/

https://www.audacy.com/kluv/blogs/miles-in-the-morning/woman-keeps-telling-police-her-name-is-my-butt-just-farted

https://www.sciencealert.com/lots-of-people-die-every-year-during-or-after-having-sex-a-pathologist-explains-why

https://www.medindia.net/news/sex-toys-can-actually-be-fatal-140043-1.htm

https://www.dailyrecord.co.uk/news/uk-world-news/woman-dies-of-heart-attack-while-using-1063863

https://www.nbcphiladelphia.com/news/national-international/natlman-who-owned-killer-bear-chokes-to-death-on-sex-toy/1888662/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GfLPpXkr-Mk&feature=youtu.be

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
